data.text: @medexaempaz [+] Caso o seu bilhete tenha sido adquirido com uma agência de viagens, pedimos que entre em contato com a agência que você comprou o bilhete, para verificar maiores informações. Estamos à disposição.
@medexaempaz [+] Caso sim, para que possamos verificar algumas informações, por favor, nos informe o código da reserva ou o número do e-ticket (bilhete) via DM. [+]

@medexaempaz [+] Nossos diversos canais de atendimento ao cliente estão recebendo um grande número de consultas e solicitações, dificultando a atenção adequada a todos os pedidos. Contudo, você ainda precisa de ajuda? [+]
@medexaempaz Bom dia! Diante da situação que estamos enfrentando em função do coronavírus (covid-19), estamos fazendo todos os esforços possíveis para atendermos e orientarmos nossos passageiros. [+]

@Jvm83 Hello, we have sent you a message via DM. Regards.
@Nishy2889 Hi, our apologies for the delay in response. We can help you, please send us your booking code or ticket number plus your full name by DM. We'll look forward to it. Regards.

@vrieslqp Hello, we can help you through this means. Please, send us via DM your booking code or ticket number and your complete name. Our apologies for the delay in response. We will be waiting for your reply. Regards.
@1dd1e8e72fd045e Quedamos atentos a tus futuros comentarios. Saludos.
@1dd1e8e72fd045e Hola, para poder asistirte, bríndanos por DM tu código de reserva o número de ticket y nombres completos de los pasajeros. Saludos.
@RealRuissan Hello, we have sent you a DM. Regards.
@Curvaspoliticas Hi, please send us a DM with your booking code. Sorry for the delay. Regards.
@CarolinaCoolie Hi, if you still need assistance, please send us a DM with your full name and booking code. Regards.

@clotUy Hola, si aún requieres de nuestra asistencia, envíanos a través de DM el código de reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 dígitos) y el nombre completo del pasajero. Te ofrecemos disculpas por el tiempo de respuesta. Quedamos atentos a tus comentarios. Saludos.

During difficult times, our commitment is even stronger. Find out the answers to the frequently asked questions that we have been receiving during these days. Find out more answers on our Help Center at https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv https://t.co/vxeb2q1QvE

Welcome back! In just 3 days, we have operated 19 flights taking 3,370 passengers back to their homes. If you have been affected by border closure or a state of emergency, please complete the following form to evaluate a return place for you: https://t.co/syIMIIHjjs https://t.co/FGx9BVJVLW
@mongesterr Hello, we have sent you a message through inbox. Regards.

@guicaro Hola, te ofrecemos disculpas por el tiempo de respuesta, si aún necesitas de nuestra asistencia indícanos por DM el nombre completo del pasajero, código de reserva y/o número de ticket. Saludos.
@RyanKolakowski Hi, if you still need assistance, contact us back. Regards.
@MullMulligan7 Hello, we have sent you a message via DM. Regards.

During difficult times, our commitment is even stronger. Find out the answers to the frequently asked questions that we have been receiving during these days. Find out more answers on our Help Center at https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv https://t.co/ZNyxZezgE8

@BlameAngel_ Hola, si cuentas con un código de reserva y deseas realizar un cambio, bríndanos tu por DM tu código o número de ticket y nombres completos de los pasajeros; asimismo, confírmanos si deseas que te asistamos en ingles o español. Saludos.

@MsBassey Hello, we do apologize for the delay responding to your query, we're doing everything possible to reply on time due to the contingency. Let us know your booking reference/ticket number along with the full passenger's name via DM in case you require further assistance.
@Gray_Wagon_ Hi, please send us your booking code or ticket number and your full name by DM. Regards.

data.text: @fishrofls Hi, to assist you, please give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and full name of the passenger. You can also check the options we're offering here: https://t.co/dOOhKe2IYC. We apologize for the time we've taken to reply. We'll be waiting for your response.
@Becca62861178 We replied to the message you sent via DM.

#AttentionPassengers: Our contact center is at reduced capacity with our staff working remotely as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic. We are prioritizing passengers who fly in the next 48 hs and appreciate your understanding. For more info refer to: https://t.co/4Cec80pzMc https://t.co/rpXdIkc38c

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @TrentDownes Hello, we send you a message via DM. Regards.

@JosueAvarca Hello, in order to provide you a much better assistance, let us know via DM your booking reference/ticket number along with the full passenger's name. We'll be expecting your reply to proceed. Regards.
@Invisibilis7 Hi, we can assist you through this means, too. Please, send us the details about your requirement by DM. Regards.

Today we took hundreds of passengers back home. During difficult times, our commitment is even stronger. If you are a passenger affected by border closure or a state of emergency, please complete the following form: https://t.co/syIMIIHjjs https://t.co/is1Rw26pcp
@AingeEmma If your flight was cancelled, if there are restrictions for borders closure, or you want to change your travel date due to COVID-19, please check: https://t.co/WqLwdCT01e
@aintxfun If your flight was cancelled, if there are restrictions for borders closure, or you want to change your travel date due to COVID-19, please check: https://t.co/WqLwdCT01e
@MarikoBurgin Hello, we've replied through DM. We'll be expecting your response to continue with your query. Thank you so much for your contact.
@paddywhacked14 Hello, we replied to your question via DM. Kind regards.
@paddywhacked14 Hello, we sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.
@paddywhacked14 Hi, to assist you, please give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passengers. Thank you for contacting us. We'll be waiting for your response.

@AgathaPaula [+] Contudo, você conseguiu atendimento? Caso não, para que possamos verificar algumas informações, por favor, nos informe o código da reserva ou o número do e-ticket (bilhete) via DM. Estamos à disposição.

@AgathaPaula Bom dia! Devido à alta demanda que estamos recebendo devido a atual situação, o tempo de espera através da nossa central de atendimento e chat está sendo maior que o estimado, como também, o atendimento através das nossas redes sociais. [+]

@F_Fonseca13 Hello, we apologize for the time we have taken to answer, in order to assist you send us via DM the reservation code (6 capital letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and one of the passengers' full name. We will be waiting for your response.
@jobo0704 Hello, thank you for reaching us, we are deeply sorry for the delay in our answer, let us know if you still require our assistance, bear in mind that we are here to help you. Kind regards.
@Diana_I_Calle Hi, to assist you properly, please give us via DM your booking code or ticket number, and the full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your response.
@MarikoBurgin Hello, we sent you a DM. Kind regards.
@abellamariela Hello Mariela, we sent you an answer though inbox. Regards.
@gatofoli Hi, we've sent you a reply via DM. Regards.

@tatipapis Hi, we apologize for the delay on responding to your request, we're doing everything possible to reply on time. In order to provide you immediate assistance with this situation, let us know via DM the booking reference/ticket number along with the full passenger's name.
@gatofoli In order to proceed, let us know via DM your booking reference/ticket number along with the full passenger's name. We'll be expecting your reply to proceed. Kind regards.
@CejaneMonteiro Hello, thank you so much for contacting us. We've sent you a reply via DM, we'll be waiting your response. Your understanding is highly appreciated. Regards.

@gatofoli Hello, we apologize for the delay on responding to your query, we're doing everything possible to reply on time due to the contingency. Let us know if you require further assistance, in order to proceed with it. Your understanding is highly appreciated. Regards.

@MarisaRoth14 Hi, for those passengers flying from/to Peru, we're offering an exception which allows the change of date, route or request the refund of unused flights. If you require more information, please let us know it by sending us your reservation code and full name via DM. Kind regards.

data.text: @debbyspessot Pedimos desculpas pela demora, no entanto, devido à alta demanda que estamos recebendo devido a atual situação, o tempo de espera está sendo maior que o estimado. Se ainda precisar de suporte, nos envie sua solicitação por DM. Seguimos à disposição.
